background-color.description: Sets the background color of an element.

font-size.description: Sets the size of the font.

values: generic family (serif, sans-serif, monospace, cursive, fantasy)

font-weight.description: Sets the weight (thickness) of the font.

text-align.description: Sets the horizontal alignment of text.

line-height.description: Sets the distance between lines of text.

margin.description: Sets the outer space around an element.

padding.description: Sets the inner space between the element's border and content.

border.description: Sets the border around an element.

border-width.description: Sets the width of the border.

border-style.description: Sets the style of the border.

border-color.description: Sets the color of the border.

width.description: Sets the width of an element.

height.description: Sets the height of an element.

display.description: Sets the display behavior of an element.

position.description: Sets the type of positioning method used for an element.

top.description: Sets the top position of a positioned element.

right.description: Sets the right position of a positioned element.

bottom.description: Sets the bottom position of a positioned element.

left.description: Sets the left position of a positioned element.

overflow.description: Sets what to do when content overflows an element's box.

z-index.description: Sets the stack order of a positioned element.

opacity.description: Sets the transparency level of an element.

box-shadow.description: Adds shadow effects around an element's frame.

transform.description: Applies 2D or 3D transformation to an element.

transition.description: Specifies the transition effects for properties.
